snippet: Two teams affected by N.C.A.A. probes, Ohio State and Miami, came up with good recruiting classes. But Penn State, dealing with a scandal, lost several players.
abstract: Two teams affected by N.C.A.A. probes, Ohio State and Miami, came up with good recruiting classes. But Penn State, dealing with a scandal, lost several players.
lead_paragraph: National signing day has turned into a made-for-television affair, with recruits selecting their universities' caps before crowds of friends and family members and an audience at home. The 2012 version of this annual rite yielded a few additional themes.

headline.main: Comebacks and Consequences on Signing Day
